text: Faux mouvement, an album by Autour de Lucie, was released in 2001 on the Nettwerk label. Many of the songs also appear remixed on their 2001 remix compilation Vu par .... ==Track listing== # "Je Reviens" – 6:10 # "Je Suis un Balancier" – 6:47 # "Sans Commentaire" – 2:51 # "Vide" – 3:46 # "Chanson De L'Arbre" – 4:48 # "Lent" – 4:12 # "Corps Etrangers" – 4:41 # "La Condition Pour Aimer" – 3:01 # "La Contradiction" – 4:56 # "Le Salon" – 3:57 # "Le Dernier Mot" – 5:03 ==References== * Category:Autour de Lucie albums Category:2001 albums
title: Faux mouvement
